name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc Version 21
overview: Interactive Multi Game Demo Disc v21 is a demo and video sampler disc (one of a number of versions available during the 2004 holiday season), designed for retail store displays of the Nintendo GameCube. The sampler includes a simple menu and playable demos of Mario Power Tennis, Metroid Prime 2: Echoes, Donkey Konga, Viewtiful Joe 2, Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean, Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, and Mario Party 6. The disc also features trailers of the following: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes, Tony Hawk's Underground 2, GoldenEye: Rogue Agent, X-Men Legends, Need for Speed: Underground 2, Mario Power Tennis, Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, Mario Party 6, The Urbz: Sims in the City, NBA Live 2005, the Nintendo DS, F-Zero: GP Legend (Cartoon), and an ESRB ratings video. Contents
